name: Elemental Resonance: Woven Ice
description:
Create 1 Cryo Die.
(You must have at least 2 Cryo characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw: Create 1 <color=#99FFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1101}Cryo Die</color>.\n(You must have at least 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

storytext: Even the sky shall shiver before the ice.
